00027 #ifndef _AVR_ADC_H_
00028 #define _AVR_ADC_H_
00029 
00030 
00031 #define AVR_ADC_AVERAGING_ON 1
00032 #define AVR_ADC_AVERAGING_OFF 2
00033 //function prototype
00034 
00035 
00036 uint16_t rssi_poll (void);
00037 
00038 /* ADC clock prescaler values:
00039    (Slower conversion is more accurate and uses less power, but the
00040    conversion rate (clk. freq. / prescaler) should be at least 50 khz.)
00041 */
00042 #define AVR_ADC_PRESCALE_2 0x00 // Fastest
00043 #define AVR_ADC_PRESCALE_4 0x02 
00044 #define AVR_ADC_PRESCALE_8 0x03 
00045 #define AVR_ADC_PRESCALE_16 0x04        
00046 #define AVR_ADC_PRESCALE_32 0x05        
00047 #define AVR_ADC_PRESCALE_64 0x06 // Recommended level for 4mhz clock
00048 #define AVR_ADC_PRESCALE_128 0x07 // Slowest
00049 
00050 #define AVR_ADC_PRESCALE_MASK 0x07 // Register mask for setting prescaler
00051 
00052 /* ADC voltage reference:
00053    (Either an internal voltage reference of 2.56v or the AVCC pin)
00054 */
00055 #define AVR_ADC_VREF_AVCC 0x01 // AVCC 
00056 #define AVR_ADC_VREF_IREF 0x03 // Internal 2.56v reference
00057 
00058 #define AVR_ADC_VREF_MASK 0xC0 // Register mask for setting vref
00059 
00060 
00061 /* ADC channel selection:
00062    (Selects which input pin to use for the conversion.)
00063 */
00064 #define AVR_ADC_CH_0            0x00
00065 #define AVR_ADC_CH_1            0x01
00066 #define AVR_ADC_CH_2            0x02
00067 #define AVR_ADC_CH_3            0x03
00068 #define AVR_ADC_CH_4            0x04
00069 #define AVR_ADC_CH_5            0x05
00070 #define AVR_ADC_CH_6            0x06
00071 #define AVR_ADC_CH_7            0x07
00072 
00073 #define AVR_ADC_CH_MASK         0x07
00074 
00075 #endif
